title: Serbia?
text:
Hi,
Is it possible to register from Serbia?

I checked the country list, Serbia is not there although some other Western Balkan countries are (like Montenegro and North Macedonia).

title: It’s a Clown Show
text: Anybody who takes their banking seriously do not come here. The things that these people do would never be permitted in any branch location bank. I had an unusual circumstance with a few charges that I needed to dispute. I went out of my way to make sure to ask all the questions I could and get all the information I could before filing the dispute. THEY GAVE ME WRONG ADVICE!! Because of the advice they gave me about which category to file it under, the disputes were not even considered. I got an email stating that if I reached out to Chat Support I could review the evidence that they used to come to this determination.. yeah, that doesn’t happen. These people have no idea what they’re doing. after this, my account became frozen in which they didn’t even tell me I had to discover this, and will not provide me a reason why. don’t put your money here. These people take no responsibility and anything they do. I’ve actually been lied to misinformed and not help at all with any of my issues here. here’s an update these people are full of bull…They don’t wanna speak to me about these issues. They’ve closed my account because of them.

title: Help..
text: How do I send my funds to my account? I have been trying it for days now. Customer service is not responding.

title: Best card out there.
text: I am blown away by this credit Card company. If you travel Globally as I do there is anyone better at this than Revolut!!

title: Worst customer service
text: There is a government regulation for them to get documents to deposit my paycheck. I have messaged them way too many times. I get it is a regulation but they don’t respond and I still haven’t my money. They only contact thru messages and do not have a contact phone number. The agents will not do anything for you but tell me that it could take 48 hours to advise me what they need. Run Run away, go to a real bank because if you sign up with them you will regret it.

title: Update has ruined it
text:
This app used to do exactly what I needed it to. Unfortunately now I’ve got some idiotic social app looking experience and the basic banking stuff works less well. 
And try getting help when you need it. 
This product is a toy.

title: Very slow local transfers!
text: Even from reputed bank like chase it takes a week to do a transfer of money.

title: The WORST!!!
text: Don’t waste your time or money!!! They accused me of scamming after I loaded my first $50 to make an online purchase and pay my phone bill!! They won’t release my money and keep going in circles about why I downloaded their app to begin with. Never had a worse experience than with Revolut! Stick with PayPal, Venmo… anything else!!!!

title: New design
text: New design is completely disaster.

title: Cuidado
text: Cuidado con aceptar alguna de sus upgrades luego cuando quieres volver al plan normal te clavan una penalización

title: A major step back
text: It used to be so clean and simple, in the period of 2018–2021-ish. It kept getting overloaded with everything, even on the main tab you can scroll and see so many unnecessary things you can’t completely get rid of. But the last major update hammered it out for good. I’m glad it has the option to keep the old interface, but please, Revolut team, take some more time to actually research if the users like it. From the brand perspective, I feel like you’re losing it. All-caps text is now reminiscent of your rival “Wise.” It feels like you’re trying to be like them, but actually you had a great sense of identity before, it stood out. Also :) Why purple all of the sudden? The bank money interface should stay familiar and recognizable, moderately strict; I believe blue is the standard for a reason. You might have been a little too quick, that’s how it feels like. Some interface elements of the new design don’t align and don’t feel cohesive—like action buttons. Tinkoff got also overloaded with stuff over the years, but they somehow manage to keep it structured and easy-to-use, though I absolutely hate freaking Stories on the main screen. Don’t make that mistake.

title: Great banking app
text: I enjoy being a Revolut user, the app works excellent and I have the ability to manage all my finances conveniently and hazzle-free.

title: Update went backwards
text:
Loved this app experience until this new update.  So cumbersome to access the >18 cards now.   Was right on the main screen before.  

Awful.

title: Worst App ever with absolutely no support
text: I have been trying to open my account for days now. At first I put my swedish phone number and it didn’t send any code. Upon reaching customer service I am told that someone already has an active account with that number and apparently there is no solution for it. Then my husband tried to open account using his swedish phone number and it all went nice until 5 minutes later the account automatically deactivated without any explanation. Reaching customer care on app is very difficult and next to impossible if you cannot login. Then I tried to open account using my US phone number thinking may be that will help and the same thing with me, it was all good until account deactivated automatically on its own saying identity couldn’t be verified. It doesn’t mention anything else. Nothing about any additional documents. Worst app experience ever

title: DONT USE THESE GUYS IF YOURE IN USA
text: the very first time I used the card they locked it down to do a “security review” and today makes it 15 days since they locked it and chat support are broken records. They don’t know anything and gave me a date for when it should be lifted and when the time came they didn’t have a answer. My funds are still locked down.

title: They charge you extra fees, beware
text: I accidentally upgraded to premium and wanted to downgrade, if you want to do the same, they will charge you $19.98 early termination fee, and if you only have $19 in your account, and because the min transfer is $20, they won’t let you do it, until you have transferred +$20, so, then you have $39 in your account just to be able to downgrade. It is the worst hidden policy in the fine print, disgusting policy and theft. The app itself is very hard to use, it’s impossible to find things on it and not user friendly. You have to search for everything for ever, and you still won’t find the simplest things, like adding a new card, or changing a card that expired. The worst app.

title: Frustrations of a Frequent Traveler
text: I was once a loyal enthusiast of this card, my go-to for all my travels. However, recent changes have dampened my enthusiasm significantly. Support is distressingly absent when the card fails internationally—a dire situation for any traveler. To add to the dismay, I awoke one day to find my card cancelled without prior notice, a bewildering move linked to a ‘free metal upgrade’ offered months before. These experiences sadly make it less and less suitable for those who travel often.

title: Financial legends
text: Financial legends

title: Massive Wait Times — Use Wise Instead
text:
Revolut is not a revolutionary concept. It’s simple what Wise and other providers have been successfully offering for years. They just market to a younger demographic. 

Now ad hominem aside, their transfer times are horrendously slow. With a bank transfer make before cutoff on 10/31 I still haven’t received the $100 transfer on 11/6. This is right at their maximum “2-4 business day limit” which is just so slow. 

They’re not given priority or something else.

Wise is IMMEDIATE. 

When dealing with transferring money and being abroad… users need money FAST. Not THIS slow. 

The customer service procedure is a laundry list of questions before you can ever speak to a representative. 

I do NOT recommend this service at this time. Stick with wise.

title: No real customer support
text: I am paying for one of the premium plans. It’s supposed to come with higher daily/weekly spending limits and priority customer service. But I am not receiving either.  Now I’m traveling and can’t use the card at ATMs because it says I hit my limit. I check, I did not come close to my limit. I try to contact 24/7 customer service “help”. I’m waiting for over an hour with absolutely no response. No help at all.  And there is no number to call. You just pay for a service and there is mo service provided and ni way to contact them.

title: defective
text: You were able to charge me $0.01 to verify two different cards from two different banks, but when I go to add funds I get "oops! something went wrong." Great. Failure to achieve basic functionality. Totally useless.

title: Do not use!! Scam fraudulent institution
text: This app is absolutely garbage unless it’s for your 16 year old kid cause that’s exactly how they treat you. My company of 125 employees have absolutely been disgusted with how this app functions. Always freezing your card. Withholding funds. I have reason to believe that this app is a 100% exit scam. This is fraud 101 with banking institutions like this. Don’t let the positive reviews fool you. When my business started banking with them they offered my employees each 10$ to write a positive review.

title: They lie and charge fees
text: I transferred money to my account and it said no fee, but then a fee was deducted anyway. Very dishonest.

title: Account closed for no reason
text:
Used it for eight months. Always get locked out because of some sort of “investigation “ 
Finally they closed my account without telling me why.

title: THEY STEAL MONEY!
text: Had got refunds from chipotle due to drivers unprofessional beside the point i hsvr proof they gave me refunds! The transactions have settled they lying saying they dont see a refund i cant talk to a human they wont give my money so i now i have to go to the court and sue and report this fraud bank to the headquarters! JUST DONTTTTT! They will take your money and u cant even speak to a human kiddy bank! (I DIDNT WANT TO GIVE 1 STAR!) MIND U THIS IS MY FIRST AND LAST TRANSACTION!

title: Fast & Cool
text: Smarter than many banking apps in Romania. And many good and useful features popping up from time to time. 😉

title: Discriminatory practices against certain nationalities
text: Revolut is utilising discriminatory practices against certain nationalities regardless if their place of living. If you happen to have the wrong color of the passport, you are guaranteed to have issues with any (even if small) international transfers and payments. They would delay the transactions and tell you that it’s totally not their fault. Their helpdesk is slow and useless. It’s a terrible service run by people with questionable integrity.

title: Activation doesn’t work. Many other bugs.
text:
I couldn’t get past an endless loop for email verification. It had me going between my email app and this app. There’s no apparent way to get support.

I’ve also been trying tjj on reset my access code. The app wouldn’t accept the one I originally set.

It’s not worth the headache imo

title: No Help and rates do not match contract
text:
Premium member / no Chat Support available.
I’m guilty of not always taking the time to double check statements. I tend to assume what I agreed to in contract will be the case ongoing. 
When I realized there was added fee on top of my monthly - I tried to reach chat for help. Time is valuable and I have given up my morning (1.45 still unresolved) no chat connection, no phone number offered. I found details on how to get to chat on this app review page, as of today, does not exist. Time to look for another service, this company seems to be failing.

title: Revolt 10

title: Never could create account
text:
Tried multiple times to create an account. The app sends a code to text. The first time it doesn’t send. When you hit “resend code” it then sends a code but then when entered it says “credentials are incorrect”. 
I even requested the code (from the starting point) as a voice call and the code received from the automated system did not work either. 
Same with requesting code via email. I’m not sure how they send it to my email when I’ve never given them my email because I’ve never been able to create an account, but again, “credentials are incorrect”. 

Would you trust a company that can’t work out a simple account creation/log in issue with your hard earned money?

I sure don’t.

title: Like the app but would like a option for classic look
text: Hi I like this whole new idea of innovation but for me the classic look is best too much going on please add a tap to keep the classic look .

title: Outstanding
text: I recently was upset that they used prepaid cards and I almost didn’t use this service.. man would I have missed out on the best finance app in the entire App Store.. this product is unrivaled..I understand now why they do the things they do and why.. transferring money to yourself and others could not be done better.. I’ve Used every product from capital one to chime.. nothing comes close.. if I could I would do free advertising for them just because of how much convenience Revolut has brought to my life..I can’t give enough stars..I’m shocked that they are ranked 96 of the financial apps.. if people words just try it they would see that it is far And away the best…I’m not even getting to the fact that you can create multi use cards and single use cards for security.. and the information on each transaction is unparalleled.. please give it a try.. it is by far the best financial decision you will ever make…

title: Miss Whesu
text: It as been amazing transaction with REVOLUT, even when decline is need you are prompt to respond.

title: Better options than Revolut
text: I use Wise all the time and never have a problem. Revolut on the other hand is a mess. I don’t trust it one bit to get my transactions right. Can’t link my major account and there is no one to help me. Customer service is almost nonexistent. I have withdrawn all my funds and will soon close my account. With Revolut there is no there there. UPDATE: Wow. Just closed my crappy account and even that was a difficult task. It’s not worth it people. If you go with Revolut be prepared for zero customer service. You’re on your own so you better hope you have no problems. UPDATE: Just deleted the app from my phone. Felt good. Just glad I never could transfer funds to Revolut so I didn’t have issues getting my money back.

title: Trash company, trash customer service
text: I have been trying to get a transfer through to pay my rent for over three weeks now. You cannot get in contact with anyone who knows what they are talking about. All you can do is chat with some frontline dumb worker that has no idea what is going on. They keep dragging me on claiming “someone is working on it” every day with no meaningful updates. I eventually had to take my business elsewhere. NEVER use this company if you want your money in trusted hands.

title: App isn’t updated for iPhone 15 pro max camera
text: Can’t even verify my ID because they haven’t updated the camera support in app. The camera won’t focus so it’s impossible to submit a clear image for verification

title: No transfer
text: It irritates me knowing I can’t pull money off it or send it back to my actual bank account…it will not let you transfer obey off it unless you at a ATM

title: I don’t understand the rant
text: I’ve been using Revolut for quite some time now and I love it! I don’t understand what people are complaining about honestly, my experience is very smooth. And they are very transparent about the fees and transactions. My account is free and it is free! EU transactions are free and atm withdrawals are free most of the time, yes not always but that’s ok.
